name: radarr
description: Radarr is a self-hosted movie collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It monitors RSS feeds, searches for movies, and automatically downloads and renames content.
features: Automated downloads: Monitor RSS feeds and automatically grab movies when they become available.
Quality profiles: Define preferred resolutions, codecs, and file sizes to download the right version.
Indexer integration: Connect to Usenet and torrent indexers to search across multiple sources simultaneously.
Calendar view: See upcoming releases and track when movies will be available for download.
Library management: Automatically rename and organize downloaded movies into a consistent folder structure.
Metadata fetching: Pull movie information, posters, and artwork from TMDb for rich library presentation.
Custom formats: Create advanced rules for preferred release groups, audio formats, and encoding settings.
Import lists: Automatically add movies from IMDb lists, Trakt, or other sources to your collection.
Upgrade monitoring: Replace existing movies with higher quality versions when they become available.
Download client support: Integrate with popular clients like qBittorrent, Transmission, and SABnzbd.
Notifications: Send alerts to Discord, Slack, or other services when movies are added or downloaded.
API access: Build custom integrations and automation using the comprehensive REST API.
